description: After gaining experience in top-quality restaurants, chef Marco Verginer has embarked on a new adventure running his own brand-new restaurant in the equally new Badia Hill hotel. In an elegant and spacious setting, enjoy modern, occasionally creative cuisine which skilfully blends Alpine flavours and ingredients with delicious Mediterranean influences.
